verses.text: And they \w continued|strong="H3427"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* without \w war|strong="H4421"\w* between \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it came to pass in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, that \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* ye that \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \add is\add* ours, and we \add be\add* \w still|strong="H2814"\w*, \add and\add* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* it not out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*?\f + \fr 22.3 \ft still…: Heb. silent from taking it\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, Wilt thou \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with me to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*? And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I \add am\add* as \w thou|strong="H3644"\w* \add art\add*, my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, my \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* as thy \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Enquire|strong="H1875"\w*, I pray thee, at the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, about \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Shall I \w go|strong="H3212"\w* against \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, or shall I \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*? And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is there\add* not here a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w besides|strong="H5750"\w*, that we might \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of him?

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \add There is\add* yet \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Imlah|strong="H3229"\w*, by whom we may \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* him; for he doth not \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* concerning me, but \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*. And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let not the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* so.

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w an|strong="H0259"\w* \w officer|strong="H5631"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hasten|strong="H4116"\w* \add hither\add* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Imlah|strong="H3229"\w*.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft officer: or, eunuch\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w each|strong="H0376"\w* on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, having put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* their \w robes|strong="H0899"\w*, in a void \w place|strong="H1637"\w* in the \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*; and all the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.\f + \fr 22.10 \ft void…: Heb. floor\f*

And \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Chenaanah|strong="H3668"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, With these shalt thou \w push|strong="H5055"\w* the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*, until thou have \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them.

And all the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* so, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*, and \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And the \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* that was \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold now, the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \add declare\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: let thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, I pray thee, be like the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of them, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \add that which is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

And \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, what the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, that will I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

¶ So he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w*, shall we \w go|strong="H3212"\w* against \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, or shall we \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, \w Go|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, How many \w times|strong="H6471"\w* shall I \w adjure|strong="H7650"\w* thee that thou \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* me nothing but \add that which is\add* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* upon the \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, as \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* that have not a \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, These have no \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: let them \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, Did I not \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee that he would \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* concerning me, but \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou therefore the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* by him on his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* and on his \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall \w persuade|strong="H6601"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, that he may go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* at \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*? And one \w said|strong="H0559"\w* on this \w manner|strong="H3541"\w*, and another \w said|strong="H0559"\w* on that \w manner|strong="H3541"\w*.\f + \fr 22.20 \ft persuade: or, deceive\f*

And there came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w persuade|strong="H6601"\w* him.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Wherewith? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and I will be a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of all his \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w persuade|strong="H6601"\w* \add him\add*, and \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* also: go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* so.

Now therefore, behold, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of all these thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* concerning thee.

But \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Chenaanah|strong="H3668"\w* went \w near|strong="H5066"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* on the \w cheek|strong="H3895"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Which \w way|strong="H0335"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* from me to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee?

And \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, when thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into an \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w* to \w hide|strong="H2247"\w* thyself.\f + \fr 22.25 \ft into…: or, from chamber to chamber: Heb. a chamber in a chamber\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w*, and carry him \w back|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* the \w governor|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and to \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Put|strong="H7760"\w* this \add fellow\add* in the \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* him with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H3906"\w* and with \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H3906"\w*, until I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

And \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou \w return|strong="H7725"\w* at \w all|strong="H7725"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* by me. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, every one of you.

So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, I will \w disguise|strong="H2664"\w* myself, and \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*; but put thou \w on|strong="H3847"\w* thy \w robes|strong="H0899"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w disguised|strong="H2664"\w* himself, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 22.30 \ft I will…: or, when he was to disguise himself, and enter into the battle\f*

But the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* his \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* that had rule over his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fight|strong="H3898"\w* neither with \w small|strong="H6996"\w* nor \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, save only with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, that they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely it \add is\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And they turned \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against him: and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* cried \w out|strong="H2199"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w perceived|strong="H7200"\w* that it \add was\add* not the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* from \w pursuing|strong="H0310"\w* him.

And a \add certain\add* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w drew|strong="H4900"\w* a \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* at a \w venture|strong="H8537"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* between the \w joints|strong="H1694"\w* of the \w harness|strong="H8302"\w*: wherefore he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the driver of his \w chariot|strong="H7395"\w*, \w Turn|strong="H2015"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and carry me \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*; for I am \w wounded|strong="H2470"\w*.\f + \fr 22.34 \ft at a…: Heb. in his simplicity\f*\f + \fr 22.34 \ft joints…: Heb. joints and the breastplate\f*\f + \fr 22.34 \ft wounded: Heb. made sick\f*

And the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w increased|strong="H5927"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* was stayed \w up|strong="H5975"\w* in his \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w against|strong="H5227"\w* the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*: and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* ran \w out|strong="H3332"\w* of the \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H2436"\w* of the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*.\f + \fr 22.35 \ft increased: Heb. ascended\f*\f + \fr 22.35 \ft midst: Heb. bosom\f*

And there \w went|strong="H5674"\w* a \w proclamation|strong="H7440"\w* throughout the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* about the going \w down|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his own \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, and was \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*; and they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.\f + \fr 22.37 \ft was brought: Heb. came\f*

And \add one\add* \w washed|strong="H7857"\w* the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* in the \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*; and the \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* licked \w up|strong="H3952"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; and they \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* his \w armour|strong="H2185"\w*; according unto the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and the \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which he \w made|strong="H1129"\w*, and all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that he \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?
So \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* in the \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \add was\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Azubah|strong="H5806"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Shilhi|strong="H7977"\w*.

And he \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in all the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; he turned not \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* from it, \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: nevertheless the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* were not taken \w away|strong="H5493"\w*; \add for\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* yet in the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.
And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* made \w peace|strong="H7999"\w* with the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, and his \w might|strong="H1369"\w* that he \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w*, and how he \w warred|strong="H3898"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

And the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w sodomites|strong="H6945"\w*, which \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w*, he \w took|strong="H1197"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
\add There was\add* then no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*: a \w deputy|strong="H5324"\w* \add was\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* of \w Tharshish|strong="H8659"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w* for \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: but they \w went|strong="H1980"\w* not; for the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* were \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* at \w Ezion-geber|strong="H6100"\w*.\f + \fr 22.48 \ft made…: or, had ten ships\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* unto \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, Let my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* in the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*. But \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not.

¶ And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

¶ \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* the \w seventeenth|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* two \w years|strong="H8141"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*:

For he \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* him, and provoked to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, according to all that his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.
